nodes.text: CT-66-3238 was a cadet and part of Bravo Squad. When ARC trooper Commander Colt arrived to supervise the graduation tests of the clone cadets, Bravo Squad was the first team to take the Citadel Challenge. During this challenge, the cadets worked as a team and got close to the citadel. CT-66-3339 then told him to go for the tower while the others covered him. CT-66-3238 succeeded and Bravo Squad finished the course in record time.

This Bravo Squad cadet's identification number was first depicted in the episode "Clone Cadets" of Star Wars: The Clone Wars. It says 66-3238, and the prefix CT- was predetermined. This way of determining identification numbers was proved with the troopers in Domino Squad.
